Package roboguice.fragment

Interface Summary
FragmentUtil.f<fragType,fragManagerType>  
 

Class Summary
FragmentUtil Fragment utility class, it's actual implementation will use native or support library v4 fragment's based on whether or not the underlying app uses support library or not.
RoboDialogFragment Provides an injected DialogFragment based on support library v4.
RoboFragment Provides an injected Fragment based on support library v4.
RoboListFragment Provides an injected ListFragment based on support library v4.
RoboSherlockDialogFragment Provides an injected SherlockDialogFragment based on ActionBarSherlock's Dialog Fragments.
RoboSherlockFragment Provides an injected SherlockFragment based on ActionBarSherlock's Fragments.
RoboSherlockListFragment Provides an injected SherlockListFragment based on ActionBarSherlock's Fragments.
